text:
Hi everyone! I'm a Content Marketing Lead at Lokalise and we're looking for a B2B SaaS Content Marketing Writer. This person will be working directly with me and trust me when I say - we have big plans ahead  :nerd_face:

We're the fastest-growing localization B2B SaaS at $4m ARR and 70+ employees, expecting to double the team in 18 months via remote.

More about the company: Lokalise is an all-in-one localization platform for software, apps, websites, games, and more. We help streamline the localization and translation process, enabling product teams to significantly shorten their time to market and successfully grow multilingual products. We're ambitious and rapidly growing B2B SaaS with over 1500 customers in 80 countries, from early-stage businesses to scaleups including Notion, Revolut, Lemonade, and Fortune 500 companies.

We're looking for talented people who would also be a cultural fit. Please take a look at the <https://talent.cake.hr/jobs/35c4ac29-2e8a-4b31-9be1-998b3d1cd4a0|job ad> and apply directly on the careers page if you think we might be a fit. If this is not really up your alley, share it with people who you think might be interested in this opportunity. Thank you! :muscle:

attachments.title: Lokalise - B2B SaaS Content Marketing Writer
attachments.text: HR Software, Human Resource Software, CakeHR
attachments.fallback: B2B SaaS Content Marketing Writer: Lokalise - B2B SaaS Content Marketing Writer

text: Mia, two questions: 1) Can you please confirm if this is a fully remote (from anywhere) role. 2) Couldn't find anything on the culture, can you please share a link? Thanks in advance.

text:
Hey Folks! :wave::skin-tone-2: I'm hiring an <https://jobs.lever.co/fishtownanalytics/e5a16912-063c-4c3a-b0dc-8e79bcb3860b|Alliances Marketing Manager> (based anywhere in the US)

*Base salary:* $90,000 - $115,000

The role would be a good fit for...
:chart_with_upwards_trend: a background  in data / analytics / experience with SQL
 :rocket: interest in building co-marketing programs with the big names in modern data tech (Snowflake, AWS, Google BigQuery, Databricks, Fivetran)
:handshake: highly collaborative -- you get along with lots of personality types and you're good at keeping things on track and all interests aligned

Our company is a good fit for people who....
• believe that Black Lives Matter and are willing to put in the work to create an inclusive workplace
• find themselves nodding along to <https://www.fishtownanalytics.com/values/|our values>
• enjoy communicating via writing (we're on the path toward being a global, distributed team and are building the asynchronous communication muscle)
• enjoy the innate satisfaction of a job well done and prefer a low-hype work environment
Happy to answer any questions in a thread below or DM me.

Have a wonderful weekend!

user_profile.real_name: Janessa Lantz, VP of Marketing at dbt Labs
user_profile.name: janessalantz
